body:
Hey! 
I know i'm not new player here, but i feel bad being here.
I feel like i have not much friends and stuff make me happy.
So, in this post its going to be like AMA, But you gonna tell me about yourself so i will know you more, and hope we will be friends.
Contact me via skype: ERIC_MCgamer.
My goal is earn good friends here, for the time im here will be better :D
Thanks!

I'm Kacers. Or Kacie. Or Karcers. u_u. I've been here for a bit over a year. I have some friends, but I get a feeling that some people dislike me. I really don't care about it anyway, I don't want people dragging on me. I'm a nerd. I enjoy sports. Yeah, that's about it for me. 
Can't tell if AMA, or a life story post. ^u^

replies.body: is it true you asked to be banned then appealed it?
replies.body_tagged: is it true you asked to be banned then appealed it?

replies.body:
@panda: No, staff told me so if I will get one more infraction it will be a perm ban, they were right.
then I earned my last infraction and knew I'm going to get the ban, so I requested to be banned faster so I won't feel sad more time,  I didn't want to be banned.
then I appealed it and playing on Avicus again with you all <3
